headline: Markel Insurance appoints Preeti Gureja as Chief Risk Officer, US and Bermuda
summary: Markel Insurance, the insurance operation within Markel Group Inc. (NYSE:MKL), today announced the appointment of Preeti Gureja as Chief Risk Officer, US & Bermuda, subject to any required regulatory approvals. In her role, Gureja will lead the risk agenda across Markel's US and Bermuda insurance operations and report to Henry Gardener, Chief Risk Officer, Markel Insurance.
